refentryinfo.title: Actual date tXt file = create timestamp text file with optional name linux/windows

refnamediv.refpurpose: Actual date tXt file = create timestamp text file with optional name linux/windows

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Actual date tXt file = create timestamp text file with optional name linux/windows
ax ............ without commandline line parameter it creates just ./2000_05_25.txt
ax name ....... with string parameter it creates ./2000_05_25_name.txt

refsect1.title: FILE_NAME
refsect1.para: Name string used as suffix for text file name.
